page.title: 03HI-TECH IN TONG HALL
page.content: U Along the quiet, tree_lined drive we first glimpse the soft pink brick facade; as we round the carriage sweep the elegant{Queen Anne house}towers over us. Passing under the glass sun_dial fanlight into the high entrance hall we are greeted by an efficient receptionist, for this is no museum but the home of{nine thriving {businesses. }We find architects of modern leisure centres, producers of TV commercials, publishers of car handbooks. In a sunny drawing room an insurance broker sits with his back to a view of the valley. In the brick cellar the latest TV technology replaces the vintage wines: a console of switches and screens used to make industrial films by a firm planning future satellite connections. The home of the{Tempests}is now the home of{technology.
